description: A logger client for errors/exceptions in Meteor JS projects
engines#1: We specify npm >= 2 to get proper local dependency support in
engines#2: application itself ; this is not a package dependency per se.
name: filog

scripts.ts-compile: rm -fr lib src/*.js src/*/*.js; tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.ts-compile-tests: rm -fr lib src/*.js src/*/*.js; tsc -p tsconfig_test.json
scripts.compile: rm -fr lib/* ; rm -fr node_modules ; meteor npm i && meteor npm run test-compile
scripts.test-integration: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest            __tests__/integration/test.ts
scripts.test-unit: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest            __tests__/unit/test.ts
scripts.test: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest            __tests__/**/test.*
scripts.cover: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest --coverage __tests__/**/test.*
